      • getTheEnvironments

        protected String[] getTheEnvironments(File resourceResult)
        Parameters:
        resourceResult - The directory where to search for different environments.
        Returns:
        The list of identified environments. This list is converted to lower case.

      • environmentNamesAreValid

        protected List<String> environmentNamesAreValid(String[] environmens)
        This will check if an environment (directory) contains a space cause the environment will later being used as a classifier which does not allow a space.
        Parameters:
        environmens - The environments which should be checked.
        Returns:
        The list contains the invalid environments. If the list is empty all environments are ok.

      • getArchiveFile

        protected File getArchiveFile(File basedir,
                              String finalName,

                              String archiveExt)
        Returns the archive file to generate, based on an optional classifier.
        Parameters:
        basedir - the output directory
        finalName - the name of the ear file
        classifier - an optional classifier
        Returns:
        the file to generate

        protected void validateEnvironments(String[] identifiedEnvironments)
                             throws org.apache.maven.plugin.MojoFailureException
        This will validate the environments and will fail the build in case of errors.
        Parameters:

        Throws:
        org.apache.maven.plugin.MojoFailureException - in case of invalid environments.
